Title: 063: How to Keep up with Data Science Trends
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Aspiring Data Scientist Erika Dorland. You will learn about the different ways to keep up in Data Science, hear about the women in data science community, know the importance of communication skills and you will also get valuable tips on how to leverage your unique strengths when it comes to Data Science whichever background you’re coming from.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/63
